# freeipa_hostgroup (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "freeipa_hostgroup" "hostgroup-1" {
  name        = "hostgroup-1"
  description = "FreeIPA hostgroup"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Hostgroup name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Hostgroup Description

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the resource
